subject: Re: Breakthru Landing Page Updates
preview: Hi Joshua,  Thanks for sharing the screenshot.   It seems that the "conditional" is a bit buggy. We have created a new global block.  No Labels Campaign Page → Tags now display SDA/SIL  Specialist D

full_threads.body:
Hi Joshua,

Thanks for sharing the screenshot.

It seems that the "conditional" is a bit buggy. We have created a new global block.
  • No Labels Campaign Page
    → Tags now display SDA/SIL

  • Specialist Disability Accommodation Sydney (SDA) | Breakthru
  • SIL Accommodation Sydney | Supported Independant Living
  • Our Properties | NDIS Housing & Rentals | Breakthru
    → Tags continue to display Available/Occupied

Let me know if this works for you?

Thanks heaps Joel! The campaign page is now displaying available/occupied instead of SIL/SDA, are you able to potentially refresh the cache server side or look into this when you get a chance?

Thanks,

Joshua Cook

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212


|

M 0490 305 252


|

E Joshua.Cook@breakthru.org.au

​​​​

Level 2, 689 Ann Street Fortitude Valley Queensland 4006

breakthru.org.au





I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Joshua,

I hope you’re doing well!

Just letting you know we’ve updated the pages and blocks as requested:
  • No Labels Campaign Page
    → Tags now display SDA/SIL

  • Specialist Disability Accommodation Sydney (SDA) | Breakthru
  • SIL Accommodation Sydney | Supported Independant Living
  • Our Properties | NDIS Housing & Rentals | Breakthru
→ Tags continue to display Available/Occupied

Thanks again for flagging this, and please don’t hesitate to reach out if you’d like any other tweaks.

Hi team,

Hopefully a quick one for you on the breakthru.org.au website. Thanks for adding that feature to display SIL/SDA as requested. We've identified an issue recently where this appears to have applied across the whole site, where I really only wanted this feature applied to the No Labels landing page.

On the following pages, I still want the tags to remain the same (particularly tags showing occupied) so that we don't have people enquiring for properties that are full:
Specialist Disability Accommodation Sydney (SDA) | Breakthru
SIL Accommodation Sydney | Supported Independant Living
Our Properties | NDIS Housing & Rentals | Breakthru

Are you able to add some dynamic/conditional logic so that the SIL/SDA tag shows on the No Labels campaign landing page, but the above 3 landing pages retain the Available/Occupied tags? Let me know, thank you!

Regards,

Joshua Cook

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212


|

M 0490 305 252


|

E Joshua.Cook@breakthru.org.au

Fantastic, thank you Joel and Andy! Really appreciate it.

Regards,

Joshua Cook

Hi Joshua,

Thanks so much for sharing the details. The landing page is looking fantastic!

We’ve gone ahead and made the requested changes:
  1. Accommodation Cards – These now filter to only available properties. I’ve also added the callouts/tags so you can easily see which are SDA and which are SIL.
    • ✅ Done (some accommodations now display both SDA and SIL).
  2. Testimonials – I’ve updated this section so it only shows the bottom testimonial (image left, text right).
    • ✅ Done (duplicated the testimonial global block and set it so the testimonial with image left only appears on this page).
  3. Text Above Video ("No Labels. Just Living") – I’ve centered the title/body text and added padding so it sits cleanly without overlapping the background line.
    • ✅ All sorted.

Everything should now be in place—please take a look and let me know if it feels right to you. Always happy to jump in and help!

Hi Josh,

Thanks for sharing with us.

I've reviewed and this is clear (thanks for the image). @Joel should be able to take care of Friday.

We will confirm later this morning (and thanks for laying it on thick. we appreciate it!).

Hi guys,

Can someone (I'm assuming Joel will be the lucky individual) help with a couple of urgent-ish landing page updates on breakthru.org.au?

We have created a new landing page here that needs to go live on Monday next week:
Breakdance | No Labels. Just Living. 2 | No Labels. Just Living. 2 | PW = Nolabels

Can you please assist with the following changes:
  1. We have setup the accommodation cards to filter to only available properties. Can you please assist with adding callouts/tags to these properties as per the attached image? We want to visually identify which are SIL and which are SDA. I believe these tags/categories should already be applied in the back end - hoping this isn't too much trouble.
  2. You'll see 2 testimonials we were testing in the testimonial loop tile section. Can you please update this to only use the bottom one (image left, testimonial text right).
  3. Please assist with tidying the text above the video "No Labels. Just Living" - Please centre the title/body text, and add padding to ensure they're not sitting on/over the line element in the background.

I know we're laying it on thick at the moment with the college website launch, but hoping these changes aren't too much trouble. Let me know if any of this is not possible tomorrow.

Cheers,
Joshua Cook
Marketing Manager, Disability Services
T 1800 767 212
|
M 0490 305 252
